flawed_nl_solution:
Half of the students are playing basketball, which means 20 / 2 = <<20/2=10>>10 students play basketball.
Two-fifths plays volleyball, which leaves us with 20 * 2/5 = <<20*2/5=8>>8 students.
One-tenth play both games, which means 20 * 1/10 = <<20*1/10=2>>2 students.
There are 10 + 8 = <<10+8=18>>18 students who play basketball or volleyball.
Among these 18 students, 2 of them are playing both games, so that means 18 - 2 = <<18-2=14>>14 students play only one of the two games.
So finally, 20 - 14 = <<20-14=6>>6 students do not play either game.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
